labels.npm.save.exact.missing: I will set enable npm save-exact, please confirm.
labels.welcome.first.visit.title: Hi {name},
labels.welcome.first.visit:
welcome to '{packageName}'.
We are happy to have you on the project.
I'm your contribute buddy and will help you onboarding.

But how does it work?

I will show you are relevant informations about the project here in your cli.
The whole introdution is splitted into sections which will help you to focus on the current topic.
On many sections you will find links. You can open them by select the link with the cursor keys and press enter.

If you finished a topic, select "Continue" or "I accept" and press enter.

Thanks a lot in advance üëè
